formable_nations_mod_category  = {
}

formable_nations_africa_category  = {
	formable_nations_africa  = {
		
		ai_will_do  = {
			factor  = 100
		}
		
		cost  = 0  days_re_enable  = 0
		
		visible  = {
			NOT  = { has_country_flag  = nation_formed }
			NOT  = { has_country_flag  = hide_formable_nations }
			OR  = {
				capital_scope  = { is_on_continent  = africa }
			}
		}
		
		available  = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip  = { 
				tooltip  = africa_requirement_tooltip 
				OR  = {
					AND  = {
						all_state  = {
							OR  = {
								AND  = {
									is_on_continent  = africa
									NOT  = {
										OR  = {
											state  = 697
											state  = 178
											state  = 702
											state  = 703
											state  = 704
											state  = 297
											state  = 705
											state  = 708
											state  = 709
											state  = 706
											state  = 707
											state  = 713
											state  = 543
											state  = 90
										}
									}
									is_controlled_by  = ROOT
								}
								NOT  = { is_on_continent  = africa }
								state  = 697
								state  = 178
								state  = 702
								state  = 703
								state  = 704
								state  = 297
								state  = 705
								state  = 708
								state  = 709
								state  = 706
								state  = 707
								state  = 713
								state  = 543
								state  = 906
							}
						}
					}

				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip  = { tooltip  = not_already_existing_tt NOT  = { any_country  = { has_cosmetic_tag  = FORM_AFR } } }
		}
		icon  = formable_nations_africa
		complete_effect  = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						r56rp_rules_fp_controlled < 4
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = r56rp_rules_fp_set_4.tt
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_fp_controlled = 4 }
			}
			capital_scope  = { set_state_flag  = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag  = FORM_AFR
			add_ideas  = generic_recent_political_unification
			add_ideas  = generic_recent_army_unification
			add_ideas  = generic_recent_economic_unification	
			custom_effect_tooltip  = core_land
			hidden_effect  = { sound_effect  = complete_focus  set_country_flag  = nation_formed
				every_state  = {
					limit  = { 
						is_on_continent  = africa
						NOT  = { is_core_of  = ROOT }
					}
					add_core_of  = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

formable_nations_south_america_category  = {
	formable_nations_south_america  = {
	
		ai_will_do  = {
			factor  = 1
			
		}
		
		cost  = 0  days_re_enable  = 0
		
		visible  = {
			NOT  = { has_country_flag  = nation_formed }
			NOT  = { has_country_flag  = hide_formable_nations }
			OR  = {
				capital_scope  = { is_on_continent  = south_america }
			}
		}
		
		available  = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip  = { 
				tooltip  = south_america_requirement_tooltip 
				OR  = {
					all_state  = {
						OR  = {
							AND  = {
								is_on_continent  = south_america
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT
								NOT  = {
									state  = 690
									state  = 693
									state  = 689
									state  = 315
									state  = 318
									state  = 319
									state  = 692
									state  = 694
									state  = 308
									state  = 686
									state  = 311
									state  = 313
									state  = 312
									state  = 314
									state  = 316
									state  = 317
									state  = 299
									state  = 720
									state  = 649
									state = 994
									state = 972
								}
							}
							NOT  = {
								is_on_continent  = south_america
							}
							OR  = {
								state  = 690
								state  = 693
								state  = 689
								state  = 315
								state  = 318
								state  = 319
								state  = 692
								state  = 694
								state  = 308
								state  = 686
								state  = 311
								state  = 313
								state  = 312
								state  = 314
								state  = 316
								state  = 317
								state  = 299
								state  = 720
								state  = 649
								state = 994
								state = 972
							}
						}
					}

				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip  = { tooltip  = not_already_existing_tt NOT  = { any_country  = { has_cosmetic_tag  = FORM_SOU } } }
		}
		icon  = formable_nations_south_america
		complete_effect  = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						r56rp_rules_fp_controlled < 4
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = r56rp_rules_fp_set_4.tt
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_fp_controlled = 4 }
			}
			capital_scope  = { set_state_flag  = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag  = FORM_SOU
			add_ideas  = generic_recent_political_unification
			add_ideas  = generic_recent_army_unification
			add_ideas  = generic_recent_economic_unification
			custom_effect_tooltip  = core_land
			hidden_effect  = { sound_effect  = complete_focus  set_country_flag  = nation_formed
				every_state  = {
					limit  = {
						is_on_continent  = south_america
						NOT  = { 
							is_core_of  = ROOT 
							state  = 690
							state  = 693
							state  = 689
							state  = 315
							state  = 318
							state  = 319
							state  = 692
							state  = 694
							state  = 308
							state  = 686
							state  = 311
							state  = 313
							state  = 312
							state  = 314
							state  = 316
							state  = 317
						}
					}
					add_core_of  = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

formable_nations_north_america_category  = {
	formable_nations_north_america  = {#continent
	
		ai_will_do  = {
			factor  = 1
			
		}
		
		cost  = 0  days_re_enable  = 0
		
		visible  = {
			NOT  = { has_country_flag  = nation_formed }
			NOT  = { has_country_flag  = hide_formable_nations }
			NOT = {	original_tag = USA	}
			OR  = {
				capital_scope  = { is_on_continent  = north_america }
			}
		}
		
		available  = {
		custom_trigger_tooltip  = {
			tooltip  = north_america_requirement_tooltip
			OR  = {
				AND  = {
					OR  = { is_subject  = no has_global_flag  = puppets_allowed }
					
					all_state  = {
						OR  = {
							AND  = {
								OR  = {
									is_on_continent  = north_america
									state  = 311
									state  = 313
									state  = 312
									state  = 314
									state  = 316
									state  = 317
									state  = 685
									state  = 304
								}
								NOT  = {
									OR  = {
										state  = 696
										state  = 101
										state  = 739
										state  = 730
									}
								}
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT
							}
							NOT  = { 
								OR  = {
									is_on_continent  = north_america 
									state  = 311
									state  = 313
									state  = 312
									state  = 314
									state  = 316
									state  = 317
									state  = 685
									state  = 304
								}
							}
							state  = 696
							state  = 101
							state  = 739
							state  = 730
						}
					}
				}

			}
		}
			custom_trigger_tooltip  = { tooltip  = not_already_existing_tt NOT  = { any_country  = { has_cosmetic_tag  = FORM_NOA } } }
			
		}
		icon  = formable_nations_north_america
		complete_effect  = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						r56rp_rules_fp_controlled < 4
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = r56rp_rules_fp_set_4.tt
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_fp_controlled = 4 }
			}
			capital_scope  = { set_state_flag  = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag  = FORM_NOA
			add_ideas  = generic_recent_political_unification
			add_ideas  = generic_recent_army_unification
			add_ideas  = generic_recent_economic_unification
			set_capital  = { state  = 358 }
			custom_effect_tooltip  = core_land
			hidden_effect  = { sound_effect  = complete_focus  set_country_flag  = nation_formed
				every_state  = {
					limit  = {
						OR  = {
							is_on_continent  = north_america
							state  = 690
							state  = 693
							state  = 689
							state  = 315
							state  = 318
							state  = 319
							state  = 692
							state  = 694
							state  = 308
							state  = 686
							state  = 311
							state  = 313
							state  = 312
							state  = 314
							state  = 316
							state  = 317
							state  = 685
							state  = 304
						}
						NOT  = { 
							is_core_of  = ROOT
						}
					}
					add_core_of  = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

formable_nations_americas_category  = {
	formable_nations_americas  = {#continent
	
		ai_will_do  = {
			factor  = 1
			
		}
		
		cost  = 0  days_re_enable  = 0
		
		visible  = {
			NOT  = { has_country_flag  = nation_formed }
			NOT  = { has_country_flag  = hide_formable_nations }
			OR  = {
				capital_scope  = {OR  = { is_on_continent  = north_america  is_on_continent  = south_america } }
			}
		}
		
		available  = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip  = {
				tooltip  = north_america_requirement_tooltip
				OR  = {
					AND  = {
						OR  = { is_subject  = no has_global_flag  = puppets_allowed }
						
						all_state  = {
							OR  = {
								AND  = {
									OR  = {
										is_on_continent  = north_america
										state  = 311
										state  = 313
										state  = 312
										state  = 314
										state  = 316
										state  = 317
										state  = 685
										state  = 304
									}
									NOT  = {
										OR  = {
											state  = 696
											state  = 101
											state  = 739
											state  = 730
										}
									}
									is_controlled_by  = ROOT
								}
								NOT  = { 
									OR  = {
										is_on_continent  = north_america 
										state  = 311
										state  = 313
										state  = 312
										state  = 314
										state  = 316
										state  = 317
										state  = 685
										state  = 304
									}
								}
								state  = 696
								state  = 101
								state  = 739
								state  = 730
							}
						}
					}

				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip  = { 
				tooltip  = south_america_requirement_tooltip 
				OR  = {
					all_state  = {
						OR  = {
							AND  = {
								is_on_continent  = south_america
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT
								NOT  = {
									state  = 690
									state  = 693
									state  = 689
									state  = 315
									state  = 318
									state  = 319
									state  = 692
									state  = 694
									state  = 308
									state  = 686
									state  = 311
									state  = 313
									state  = 312
									state  = 314
									state  = 316
									state  = 317
									state  = 299
									state  = 720
									state  = 649
								}
							}
							NOT  = {
								is_on_continent  = south_america
							}
							OR  = {
								state  = 690
								state  = 693
								state  = 689
								state  = 315
								state  = 318
								state  = 319
								state  = 692
								state  = 694
								state  = 308
								state  = 686
								state  = 311
								state  = 313
								state  = 312
								state  = 314
								state  = 316
								state  = 317
								state  = 299
								state  = 720
								state  = 649
							}
						}
					}

				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip  = { tooltip  = not_already_existing_tt NOT  = { any_country  = { has_cosmetic_tag  = FORM_AME } } }
			
		}
		icon  = formable_nations_americas
		complete_effect  = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						r56rp_rules_fp_controlled < 4
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = r56rp_rules_fp_set_4.tt
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_fp_controlled = 4 }
			}
			capital_scope  = { set_state_flag  = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag  = FORM_AME
			
			add_ideas  = generic_recent_political_unification
			add_ideas  = generic_recent_army_unification
			add_ideas  = generic_recent_economic_unification
			set_capital  = { state  = 304 }
			custom_effect_tooltip  = core_land
			hidden_effect  = { sound_effect  = complete_focus  set_country_flag  = nation_formed
				every_state  = {
					limit  = {
						OR  = { is_on_continent  = north_america is_on_continent  = south_america }
						NOT  = { is_core_of  = ROOT }
					}
					add_core_of  = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

## Continent Formables END

formable_nations_mongol_empire_category  = {
	formable_nations_mongol_empire  = {
	
		ai_will_do  = {
			factor  = 100
		}
		
		cost  = 0  days_re_enable  = 0
		
		visible  = {
			NOT  = { 
				has_country_flag  = nation_formed 
				has_country_flag  = hide_formable_nations 
			}
			OR  = {
				
				original_tag  = MON
				original_tag  = TAN
			}
			
		}
		
		available  = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip  = {
				tooltip  = mongolia_requirement_tooltip 
				OR  = {
					AND  = {
						330  = { 
							OR  = {
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							}	
						}		
						817  = { 
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						818  = { 
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						819  = { 
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						820  = { 
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
					}

				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip  = {
				tooltip  = tibet_requirement_tooltip
				OR  = {
					AND  = {
						322  = { 
							OR  = { is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
							controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
						}

						757  = {

							} 
						} 
					}

				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip  = {
				tooltip  = china_requirement_tooltip
				OR  = {
					AND  = {
						615  = { 
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT

							} 
						}

							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						}

								is_controlled_by  = ROOT

							}

				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = r56rp_rules_fp_set_4.tt
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_fp_controlled = 4 }
			}
			capital_scope  = { set_state_flag  = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag  = FORM_MAC
			
			add_ideas  = generic_recent_political_unification
            add_ideas  = generic_recent_army_unification

			set_capital  = { state  = 731 }

		ai_will_do  = {
			factor  = 100
		}
		
		cost  = 0  days_re_enable  = 0
		
		visible  = {
			NOT  = { 
				has_country_flag  = nation_formed 
				has_country_flag  = hide_formable_nations 
			}
			OR  = {
				original_tag  = AST
				original_tag  = NZL
				original_tag  = PNG
				original_tag  = TAH
				original_tag  = FIJ
				
			}
		}
		
		available  = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip  = {
				tooltip  = australia_requirement_tooltip
				OR  = {
					AND  = {
						870 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						871 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						872 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						873 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						285 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						517 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						518 = {
							OR  = {

							} 
						} 
						519 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT

							} 
						} 
						520 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT

							} 
						} 
						521 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						522 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						}  
						674 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
					}

				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip  = {
				tooltip  = new_zealand_requirement_tooltip
				OR  = {
					AND  = {
						284 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						723 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
					}

				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip  = {
				tooltip  = solomon_islands_requirement_tooltip
				OR  = {
					AND  = {
						634 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
					}

				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip  = {
				tooltip  = papua_new_guinea_requirement_tooltip
				OR  = {
					AND  = {
						523 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						737 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
					}

				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip  = { tooltip  = not_already_existing_tt NOT  = { any_country  = { has_cosmetic_tag  = FORM_AAS } } }
			
		}
		icon  = formable_nations_australasia
		complete_effect  = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						r56rp_rules_fp_controlled < 4
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = r56rp_rules_fp_set_4.tt
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_fp_controlled = 4 }
			}
			capital_scope  = { set_state_flag  = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag  = FORM_AAS
			
			add_ideas  = generic_recent_political_unification
            add_ideas  = generic_recent_army_unification
            add_ideas  = generic_recent_economic_unification
			custom_effect_tooltip  = core_land
			hidden_effect  = { sound_effect  = complete_focus  set_country_flag  = nation_formed
				285  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				517  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				518  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				519  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				520  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				521  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				522  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				523  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				634  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				674  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				737  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				284  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				723  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				870  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				871  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				872  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				873  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
			}
			635  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
			636  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
			734  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
			669  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
		}
	}
}

formable_nations_levant_category  = {
	formable_nations_levant  = {
	
		ai_will_do  = {
			factor  = 100
		}
		
		cost  = 0  days_re_enable  = 0
		
		visible  = {
			NOT  = { 
				has_country_flag  = nation_formed 
				has_country_flag  = hide_formable_nations 
			}
			OR  = { 
				original_tag = MPL
				original_tag  = SYR
				original_tag  = LEB
				original_tag  = PAL
				original_tag  = JOR
				original_tag  = ISR
			}
		}
		
		available  = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip  = {
				tooltip  = levant_and_syria_requirement_tooltip
				OR  = {
					AND  = {
						553 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						554 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						677 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						799 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						680 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						454 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						} 
						455 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						}
						1016 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						}
						1017 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						}
						1021 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						}
						1022 = {
							OR  = { 
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT 
								controller  = { is_subject_of  = ROOT } 
							} 
						}
					}

				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip  = { tooltip  = not_already_existing_tt NOT  = { any_country  = { has_cosmetic_tag  = FORM_LEV } } }
			
		}
		icon  = formable_nations_levant
		complete_effect  = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						r56rp_rules_fp_controlled < 4
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = r56rp_rules_fp_set_4.tt
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_fp_controlled = 4 }
			}
			capital_scope  = { set_state_flag  = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag  = FORM_LEV
			
			add_ideas  = generic_recent_political_unification
            add_ideas  = generic_recent_army_unification
            add_ideas  = generic_recent_economic_unification
			set_capital  = { state  = 554 }
			custom_effect_tooltip  = core_land
			hidden_effect  = { sound_effect  = complete_focus  set_country_flag  = nation_formed
				454  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				455  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				553  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				554  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				677  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				799  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				680  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				949  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				966  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				1016  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				1017  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				1021  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }
				1022  = { add_core_of  = ROOT }

			}
			183  = { add_claim_by  = ROOT }
		}
	}

formable_nations_middle_east_category  = {
	formable_nations_middle_east  = {#continent
	
		ai_will_do  = {
			factor  = 100
		}
		
		cost  = 0  days_re_enable  = 0
		
		visible  = {
			NOT  = { 
				has_country_flag  = nation_formed 
				has_country_flag  = hide_formable_nations 
			}
			OR  = {
				
				capital_scope  = { is_on_continent  = middle_east }
			}
		}
		
		available  = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip  = { 
				tooltip  = middle_east_requirement_tooltip 
				OR  = {
					all_state  = {
						OR  = {
							AND  = {
								OR  = {
									is_on_continent  = middle_east
									state  = 341
									state  = 797
									state  = 907
									state  = 447
									state  = 452
									state  = 456
									state  = 457
									state  = 552
								}
								NOT  = {
									OR  = {
										state  = 230
										state  = 229
										state  = 231 
										state  = 826
										state  = 415
									}
								}
								is_controlled_by  = ROOT
							}
							NOT  = { 
								OR  = {
									is_on_continent  = middle_east
									state  = 341
									state  = 797
									state  = 907
									state  = 447
									state  = 452
									state  = 456
									state  = 457
									state  = 552
								}
							}
							state  = 230
							state  = 229
							state  = 231 
							state  = 826
							state  = 415
						}
					}

				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip  = { tooltip  = not_already_existing_tt NOT  = { any_country  = { has_cosmetic_tag  = FORM_MID } } }
			
		}
		icon  = formable_nations_middle_east
		complete_effect  = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						r56rp_rules_fp_controlled < 4
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = r56rp_rules_fp_set_4.tt
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_fp_controlled = 4 }
			}
			capital_scope  = { set_state_flag  = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag  = FORM_MID
			
			add_ideas  = generic_recent_political_unification
            add_ideas  = generic_recent_army_unification
            add_ideas  = generic_recent_economic_unification
			set_capital  = { state  = 291 }
			custom_effect_tooltip  = core_land
			hidden_effect  = { sound_effect  = complete_focus  set_country_flag  = nation_formed
				every_state  = {
					limit  = { 
						OR  = {
							is_on_continent  = middle_east
							state  = 341
							state  = 797
							state  = 907
							state  = 447
							state  = 452
							state  = 456
							state  = 457
							state  = 552
						}
						NOT  = {
							OR  = {
								state  = 230
								state  = 229
								state  = 231 
								state  = 826
								state  = 415
							}
						}
						NOT  = { is_core_of  = ROOT }
					}
					add_core_of  = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

				GER  = {
					annex_country  = {
						target  = ROOT
						transfer_troops  = yes
					}
					set_faction_leader  = yes
					add_state_core  = 762
					add_state_core  = 86
					add_state_core  = 85
					add_state_core  = 807
					add_state_core  = 188
					5  = { add_core_of  = GER }
					42  = { add_core_of  = GER }
					50  = { add_core_of  = GER }

formable_nations_intermarium_category  = {
	formable_nations_intermarium  = {
	
		ai_will_do  = {
			factor  = 100
		}
		
		cost  = 0  days_re_enable  = 0
		
		visible  = {
			NOT  = { 
				has_country_flag  = nation_formed 
				has_country_flag  = hide_formable_nations 
			}
			OR  = {
				
				original_tag  = POL
				original_tag  = CZE
				original_tag  = UKR
				original_tag  = LIT
				original_tag  = LAT
				original_tag  = EST
				original_tag  = YUG
				original_tag  = ROM
				original_tag  = HUN
			}
		}
		
		available  = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip  = {
				tooltip  = poland_requirement_tooltip

					}

						}

						limit  = {

						}

					}
				}
				add_to_faction  = ITA
				ITA  = { change_tag_from  = ROOT }
				ITA  = {
					annex_country  = {
						target  = ROOT
						transfer_troops  = yes
					}
					set_faction_leader  = yes

					39  = { add_core_of  = ITA }

					}

			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip  = { tooltip  = not_already_existing_tt NOT  = { any_country  = { has_cosmetic_tag  = FRA_UK  } } }
		}
		complete_effect  = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						r56rp_rules_fp_controlled < 4
					}

			set_cosmetic_tag = FRA_UK 
			set_global_flag = flag_franco_british_union
			add_ideas  = generic_recent_political_unification
			add_ideas  = generic_recent_army_unification
			add_ideas  = generic_recent_economic_unification
			custom_effect_tooltip  = core_land
			hidden_effect  = { sound_effect  = complete_focus  set_country_flag  = nation_formed
				add_stability = -0.2
				add_war_support = -0.15
				if = {
					limit = {
						original_tag = ENG
					}
					every_state = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = FRA
						}
						add_claim_by = ENG
					}
					FRA = {
						every_unit_leader = {
							set_unit_leader_flag = flag_former_french_general
							set_nationality = ENG
						}
					}
				}
				else = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							original_tag = FRA
						}
						every_state = {
							limit = {
								is_core_of = ENG
							}
							add_claim_by = FRA
						}
						ENG = {
							every_unit_leader = {
								set_nationality = FRA
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		complete_effect  = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						r56rp_rules_fp_controlled < 4
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = r56rp_rules_fp_set_4.tt
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_fp_controlled = 4 }
			}
			capital_scope  = { set_state_flag  = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag = FORM_ARAG
			add_ideas  = generic_recent_political_unification
			add_ideas  = generic_recent_army_unification
			add_ideas  = generic_recent_economic_unification
			custom_effect_tooltip  = core_land
			hidden_effect  = { sound_effect  = complete_focus  set_country_flag  = nation_formed
				114 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				115 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				156 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				117 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				849 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				116 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				1 =  { add_core_of = ROOT }
			}
			47 = { add_claim_by = ROOT }

		}
	}

formable_nations_dacian_empire_category  = {
	formable_nations_dacian_empire  = {
	
		ai_will_do  = {
			factor  = 100
		}
		
		cost  = 0  days_re_enable  = 0
		
		visible  = {
			NOT  = { 
				has_country_flag  = nation_formed 
				has_country_flag  = hide_formable_nations 
			}
			OR  = {
				original_tag  = ROM
			}
			
		}

				tooltip  = romania_requirement_tooltip

					AND  = {

							OR  = {

								is_controlled_by  = ROOT

		}
		icon = formable_nations_dacia
		complete_effect  = {
			IF = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						r56rp_rules_fp_controlled < 4
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = r56rp_rules_fp_set_4.tt
				set_variable = { r56rp_rules_fp_controlled = 4 }
			}
			capital_scope  = { set_state_flag  = formable_nations_old_capital }
			set_cosmetic_tag  = FORM_DAC

				43 = { add_core_of  = ROOT }

POR_expansionism_decision_category = {	#Portugal decisions to expand territorial reach
	POR_integrate_galicia = { 		#Portugal core Galicia
		icon = formable_nations_claim_galicia
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 60
		
		available = {
			owns_state = 171	#Controls Galicia
			has_completed_focus = POR_remember_olivenca
		}	
		
		visible = {
			original_tag = POR
			NOT = {
				171 = {	is_core_of = POR }
			}
		}
		
		highlight_states = {
			highlight_state_targets = {
				state = 171
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			add_stability = -0.02
			add_war_support = 0.01
			171 = {
				remove_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = autonomous_state
				}	
			}	
		}
		days_remove = 140
		modifier = {
     		political_power_gain = -0.1
			consumer_goods_factor = 0.01
		}	
		
		remove_effect = {		#Gain 2 Stability and gains core on Galicia.
	 		add_stability = 0.015
			171 = {	add_core_of = ROOT }	
		}
				
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100	
		}
	}

	POR_integrate_zambia = { 		#Portugal, gain compliance and reduce resistance on Zambia
		icon = formable_nations_zambia
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 30
		
		available = {
			OR = {
				771 = {	is_controlled_by = ROOT	}
				771 = {	is_owned_by = ROOT	}
				771 = {	is_claimed_by = POR	}
			}	
			has_completed_focus = POR_luso_tropicalism
		}	
		
		visible = {
			original_tag = POR
		}

				
		highlight_states = {
			highlight_state_targets = {
				state = 771	
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {		#Add state modifier 
			771 = { add_claim_by = POR 	
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = POR_colonial_integration
				}
			}
		}
		days_remove = 365
		modifier = {
     		political_power_gain = -0.1
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100	
		}
	}

	POR_integrate_malawi = { 		#Portugal, gain compliance and reduce resistance on Malawi
		icon = formable_nations_malawi
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 25
		
		available = {
			OR = {
				770 = {	is_controlled_by = ROOT	}
				770 = {	is_owned_by = ROOT	}
				770 = {	is_claimed_by = POR	}
			}
			has_completed_focus = POR_luso_tropicalism
		}	
		
		visible = {
			original_tag = POR
		
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_state_targets = {
				state = 770
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {		#Add state modifier 
			770 = { add_claim_by = POR 	
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = POR_colonial_integration
				}
			}
		}
		days_remove = 365
		modifier = {
     		political_power_gain = -0.1
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100	
		}
	}
	
	POR_integrate_rhodesia = { 		#Portugal, gain compliance and reduce resistance on Rhodesia
		icon = formable_nations_zimbabwe
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 20
		
		available = {

				545 = {	is_controlled_by = ROOT	}

	SPR_unify_iberia_decision = {
		icon  = formable_nations_iberia

			}
		}

			custom_trigger_tooltip  = { 
				tooltip  = SPR_controls_all_iberian_states_tt
				controls_state = 112
				controls_state = 180

				controls_state = 179		
				controls_state = 181

				698 = { add_claim_by = SPA }		
				698 = { add_claim_by = SPR }						
			}
		}

     		political_power_gain = -0.5

				179 = { add_core_of = SPA }

				697 = { add_core_of = SPR }
				698 = { add_core_of = SPA }
				698 = { add_core_of = SPR }
			}
		}

FRA_expanisonism_category = {	#Category with options to core several linguistic/historically-French states.
	FRA_core_wll = { 		#France core Wallonia
		icon = formable_nations_wallonia
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 25
		
		available = {
			controls_state = 34	#Controls Wallonie
		}	
		
		visible = {
			original_tag = FRA		#Is France
			NOT = {
				has_government = neutrality		#Not visible if France is monarchist, as they get their own decision to integrate it.
			}	
		}
		complete_effect = {		#gain 2% war support upon clicking the decision.
			add_stability = -0.04
			add_war_support = 0.02
		}

			highlight_state_targets = {
				state = 34
			}
		}

			controls_state = 45		#Controls Vojvodina

		visible = {
			original_tag = HUN
			NOT = {
				45 = {	is_core_of = HUN	}
			}
		}
		highlight_states = {
			highlight_state_targets = {
				state = 45
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {		#Add 1 war support, and claim on Vojvodina
			add_stability = -0.015
			add_war_support = 0.02
			45 = { add_claim_by = HUN }	
		}
		
		days_remove = 115
		modifier = {
     		political_power_gain = -0.1
			consumer_goods_factor = 0.01	
		}		

		remove_effect = {		#Gain 2 Stability and gains core on all required states.
	 		add_stability = 0.01
			45 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100	
		}
	}

cze_initial_zapadoslavia_formable = {		#Decision Panel for Czechoslovakia to form Zapadoslavia.
	cze_become_zapadoslavia = { 		#Czechoslovakia become Zapadoslavia
		icon = formable_nations_zapadoslavia
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 0
		
		available = {
			controls_state = 10		#Warsawza
			controls_state = 88		#Krakow
			controls_state = 90		#Kielce
			controls_state = 92		#Lublin
			controls_state = 87		#Lodz
			controls_state = 98		#Plock
			controls_state = 97		#Bialystok
			controls_state = 934	#Suwalki
		}	
		
		visible = {
			original_tag = CZE		#Is Czechoslovakia
			NOT = {
				has_cosmetic_tag = HUN_EMPIRE
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_EUR
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_VIS
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_INT
				has_cosmetic_tag  = FORM_EUA
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_HRE
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_GMO
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_AEA
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_political_power = -70
			set_capital = {
				state = 88
				remember_old_capital = no
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag  = FORM_ZAP
			custom_effect_tooltip = cze_claims_on_poland_tt
			hidden_effect =	{
				10 = { add_claim_by = CZE }
				88 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				90 = { add_claim_by = CZE }
				92 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				98 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				87 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				97 = { add_claim_by = CZE }				
				934 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				762 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				86 = { add_claim_by = CZE }	
				89 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				91 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				93 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				94 = { add_claim_by = CZE }			
				95 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				935 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				96 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				784 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				936 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				807 = { add_claim_by = CZE }	
				85 = { add_claim_by = CZE }						
			}
		}		
		
		days_remove = 125
		modifier = {
     		political_power_gain = -0.35
			consumer_goods_factor = 0.055
	 		stability_weekly = -0.002
		}		
		
		remove_effect = {		#Gain 2 Stability and gains core on all required states.
	 		add_stability = 0.02
			custom_effect_tooltip  = core_land
			hidden_effect = {
				88 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				92 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				90 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				87 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				98 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				97 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				934 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
			}
		}
				
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100		
		}
	}
}

pol_initial_zapadoslavia_formable = { 		#Czechoslovakia become Zapadoslavia
	pol_become_zapadoslavia = {
		
		icon = formable_nations_zapadoslavia
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 0
		
		available = {
			OR = {	#Restrictions preventing people from getting the benefits of multiple monarchist paths
				has_completed_focus = POL_radicalize_the_front
				has_completed_focus = POL_complete_april_constitution
				has_completed_focus = POL_rewrite_1935_constitution
				has_completed_focus = POL_cossack_king
			}
			controls_state = 9		#Cechy
			controls_state = 75	#Moravia
			controls_state = 72	#Zaolzie
			controls_state = 70	#Western Slovakia
			controls_state = 71	#Eastern Slovaia

		}
		
		visible = {
			NOT = {		#Restrictions preventing people forming multiple formables in one game
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_COM
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_EUR
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_VIS
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_INT
				has_cosmetic_tag  = FORM_EUA
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_HRE
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_GMO
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_AEA
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_POH
				has_cosmetic_tag = PLC_UNIFIED
				has_cosmetic_tag = FORM_WOR
			}
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			add_political_power = -60
			set_capital = {
				state = 88
				remember_old_capital = no
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag  = FORM_ZAP
			custom_effect_tooltip = pol_claims_on_czechoslovaia_tt
			hidden_effect =	{
				9 = { add_claim_by = CZE }
				75 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				72 = { add_claim_by = CZE }
				70 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				71 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				69 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				74 = { add_claim_by = CZE }				
				996 = { add_claim_by = CZE }		
				73 = { add_claim_by = CZE }
				664 = { add_claim_by = CZE }						
			}
		}		
		
		days_remove = 165
		modifier = {
     		political_power_gain = -0.3
			consumer_goods_factor = 0.045	
	 		stability_weekly = -0.003
		}		
		
		remove_effect = {		#Gain 3.5 Stability and gains core on all required states.
	 		add_stability = 0.035
			custom_effect_tooltip  = core_land
			hidden_effect = {
				9 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				75 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				70 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				71 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				72 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				97 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
				934 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
			}
		}
				
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100		
		}
	}
}
austrian_expansion = {
	reunify_with_hungary_dem = {
		icon = formable_nations_danubian_hungary
		fire_only_once = yes
		cost = 35
		
		available = {
			# Austria
			controls_state = 43
			controls_state = 155
			controls_state = 913
			controls_state = 154
		}	
		
		visible = {
			OR = {
				has_government = democratic
				has_government = communism
				}
			NOT = { has_global_flag = form_austria_hungary_flag }	
			
		}

		complete_effect = {
			add_stability = -0.035
			add_war_support = 0.01
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = fascism
				popularity = -0.03	
			}	
			set_global_flag = form_austria_hungary_flag
			set_cosmetic_tag = HUN_EMPIRE	
		}			
		days_remove = 70
		modifier = {
     		political_power_gain = -0.75
			consumer_goods_factor = 0.05	
		}		
		remove_effect = {
	 		add_stability = 0.015
	 		custom_effect_tooltip = hun_cored_by_aus_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				43 = {
					add_core_of = ROOT
					add_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = aus_hungarian_autonomy	
					}	
				}
				155 = {
					add_core_of = ROOT
					add_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = aus_hungarian_autonomy	
					}	
				}
				913 = {

					add_core_of = ROOT

				controls_state  = 847	
			}	
		}
		available = {
			# Austria
			owns_state = 151	
			owns_state = 3	
			OR = {
				has_government = democratic
				has_government = communism
			}
		}	
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100		
		}
		complete_effect = {
			add_stability = -0.05
			add_war_support = 0.01	
		}
		days_remove = 240
		modifier = {
  			political_power_gain = -0.25
			consumer_goods_factor = 0.015	
		}
		remove_effect = {
			add_stability = 0.01
			custom_effect_tooltip = aus_cores_in_swi_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				151 = {
					add_core_of = ROOT
					add_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = aus_swiss_autonomy	
					}	
				}
				3 = {
					add_core_of = ROOT
					add_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = aus_swiss_autonomy	
					}	
				}
			}	
		}
	}

	claim_galicia_and_bukovina = {
		icon = formable_nations_danubian_bucovina
		fire_only_once = yes

formable_nations_west_africa_category = {
	form_west_african_union = {
		fire_only_once = yes
		icon = formable_nations_west_africa
		allowed = {
			OR = {
				original_tag = SEN
				original_tag = TOG
				original_tag = IVO
				original_tag = CMR
				original_tag = DAH
				original_tag = GNA
				original_tag = NGA
				original_tag = LIB
				original_tag = MLI
			}
	
		}
		visible = {
			#avoid west africa - Ancient Mali combo
			NOT = {
				has_cosmetic_tag = MALI_UNITED
			}
		}
		available = { #
			all_state = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { is_core_of = SEN }
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			all_state = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { is_core_of = TOG }
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			all_state = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { is_core_of = IVO }
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			all_state = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { is_core_of = CMR }
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			all_state = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { is_core_of = DAH }
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			all_state = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { is_core_of = GNA }
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			all_state = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { is_core_of = NGA }
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			all_state = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { is_core_of = SIE }
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			all_state = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { is_core_of = LIB }
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
			}            
		}
		complete_effect = {
			set_cosmetic_tag = WAU_UNITED
			#if = {
			#    limit = {
			#        278 = { is_capital = no }
			#    }
			#    set_capital = 278
			#}
			hidden_effect = {
				every_state = { #This has a day of lag, for some reason.
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core_of = IVO
							is_core_of = CMR
							is_core_of = DAH
							is_core_of = TOG
							is_core_of = SEN
							is_core_of = GNA
							is_core_of = NGA
							is_core_of = LIB
							is_core_of = SIE
							is_core_of = GNB
							is_core_of = GAM
							is_core_of = LIB
						}
					}
					add_core_of = PREV #ROOT
				}
				news_event = { id = r56.news_event.37 hours = 6 }
				274 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
			}
			add_ideas = generic_recent_political_unification
			add_ideas = generic_recent_army_unification
			add_ideas = generic_recent_economic_unification
		}
	
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 50
		}
	}	
}

	form_sardinia_piedmont = {
		icon = formable_nations_piedmont
		fire_only_once = yes
		available = {
			is_subject = no
			controls_state = 114
			controls_state = 158
		}
	
		visible = {
			original_tag = SAD
			NOT = {
				has_cosmetic_tag = ITA_REBORN
				has_country_flag  = nation_formed 
				has_country_flag  = hide_formable_nations
			}
		}
	
		complete_effect = {
			158 = { add_core_of = ROOT }
			set_cosmetic_tag = SAD_PIEDMONT

			hidden_effect = {
				set_country_flag = formed_sardinia_piedmont
			}
		}
	
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
		}
	}
}

				limit = {

						r56rp_rules_fp_controlled < 4
					}
				}
